author: simonetripodi
msg: [FILEUPLOAD-229] If an actual lower/upper case is required, then should use a fixed locale (unless the code is intended to use the default locale, which is quite unusual for Commons).
A suitable locale is Locale.ENGLISH as that behaves well with ASCII and ISO-8859-1.

author: simonetripodi
